title: Facebook: Where Bullies Thrive and Truth Gets Banned
text: The Facebook app is a frustrating, biased mess that prioritizes control over fairness. Meta‚Äôs moderation is notoriously selective: inflammatory, antagonistic content often stays up unchecked, while honest, candid responses defending yourself get flagged as ‚Äúviolations,‚Äù leading to arbitrary restrictions or bans. This hypocrisy reveals a clear ideological slant in enforcement, where certain viewpoints are protected and others swiftly silenced. At its core, Facebook is antithetical to free speech, operating as a private platform that censors under the guise of ‚Äúcommunity standards‚Äù while amplifying divisive algorithms for engagement. Worst of all, it‚Äôs profoundly detrimental to children‚Äôs mental health‚Äîstudies link heavy use to increased anxiety, depression, and body image issues due to endless comparison, cyberbullying, and addictive design. Avoid this toxic app; there are better ways to stay connected. 1/5 stars.

title: 20 years on Facebook and this is what they‚Äôve done to me
text: I can‚Äôt believe this. I PAID for Meta Verified to PROTECT my business account as well as my personal account. 20 years of photos and precious memories of family, friends, and milestones ALL GONE. My business pages intellectual property, advertising campaigns, client and professional network built over years and years of hardworking‚Äî GONE! Meta, parent company of Facebook and Instagram, has implemented a defunct AI system that has been notoriously banning innocent users for false accusations or fraud, deception, and S.E of children. You can click a button to ‚Äúappeal‚Äù the decision but guess who reviews the appeal‚Ä¶ you guessed it, their defunct AI system! And forget about their false advertisement that if you pay $149 a month for meta verified business and $15 a month for personal accounts that you will have next level customer service and access to a human. I can‚Äôt reach a human because you can only reach their customer service chat system via your account and that‚Äôs a complete fail when I CANT ACCESS MY ACCOUNT. I have spent thousand in advertising for my reputable business. I have been with Facebook before Facebook was used by people over 25 years old. The fact that I had a benign grandma account with cats, kids, and a 5 star business get shut down is absurd. Meanwhile, when I reported REAL fraud accounts and TOS violations from bot users and scammers, Facebook did NOTHING to shut them down. My neighbors account was hacked and the scammer was selling and defrauding people thousands of dollars selling fake Taylor Swift tickets to the Eras tour. Users beware‚Ä¶ print your photos and put them in an album. AI is going to ruin us.

title: Facebook needs to learn to sort chronologically
text: It seems Facebook no longer sorts likes by chronological order - apparently stopped this feature in December 2025. And worse, Facebook now suggests political pages to me more and more, while showing less and often none of what my friends post. FB needs to put things in chronological order. So now, why does Facebook seem to be reducing friend posts in favor of heated political pages that I don‚Äôt even follow? In 2021, FB announced it would lower news articles in the newsfeed and now in 2025 it is SUGGESTING heated political pages that I don‚Äôt follow. A totally chronological newsfeed would be best.

title: Perch√© Facebook per me √® diventato speciale
text: Ciao, volevo condividere un pensiero che mi sta molto a cuore. Mi piace Facebook proprio perch√©, per tanto tempo, non l‚Äôavevo mai usato. Poi, quasi senza accorgermene, √® entrato nella mia vita in un momento importante. Da quando √® iniziata la guerra in Palestina, Facebook √® diventato per me uno spazio di partecipazione e di coscienza civile. Mi ha permesso di sentirmi parte di una rivolta pacifica, di un movimento di persone che non vogliono restare in silenzio davanti alla sofferenza e che credono ancora nella possibilit√† di fermare la guerra attraverso la voce collettiva. Grazie a Facebook ho conosciuto tante persone che la pensano come me, persone lontane ma incredibilmente vicine nei valori, nella sensibilit√† e nel desiderio di giustizia. Mi sono sentito meno solo e pi√π forte, perch√© condividere idee e speranze crea legami veri, anche dietro uno schermo. Inoltre, adoro poter ammirare modi di vivere, culture e costumi di ogni parte del mondo. Ogni storia, ogni immagine, ogni parola √® una finestra aperta su realt√† diverse che arricchiscono e insegnano. Per tutto questo, Facebook non √® solo un social network: per me √® diventato un luogo di incontro, di ascolto e di crescita. Un caro saluto, GB

title: I can't recover my account
text: I lost my phone in an accident, and now whenever I try to recover my Facebook account, it keeps telling me to login using my previous device. That device is gone, so this is impossible. Even though I have both my email and phone number linked to the account, Facebook doesn't send and OTP to either of them but shows the same page insisting that I use the original device instead. I have also tried recovering the account through Meta support, but I get the exact same response. There's no live chat or real support option to speak with an agent, which is extremely frustrating for such a large company.
